controls.name: Limit system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users, and devices (including other systems)
controls.description: Ensure access control policies are established and procedures are implemented.

criteria.description: Instance has a specific security group

controls.name: Limit system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute
controls.description: Ensure only authorized transactions and functions are allowed.

criteria.description: Instance has IAM roles attached

controls.name: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.
controls.description: Ensure CUI flow is controlled.

criteria.description: Instance has flow logs enabled

controls.name: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.
controls.description: Ensure duties are separated.

criteria.description: Instance has roles with separate duties

controls.name: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts.
controls.description: Ensure least privilege access is enforced.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for IAM roles

controls.name: Use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.
controls.description: Ensure non-privileged accounts are used for nonsecurity functions.

criteria.description: Instance uses non-privileged roles for nonsecurity functions

controls.name: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions and capture the execution of such functions in audit logs.
controls.description: Ensure non-privileged users are prevented from executing privileged functions.

criteria.description: Instance prevents non-privileged users from executing privileged functions

controls.name: Limit unsuccessful logon attempts.
controls.description: Ensure unsuccessful logon attempts are limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits unsuccessful logon attempts

controls.name: Provide privacy and security notices consistent with applicable CUI rules.
controls.description: Ensure privacy and security notices are provided.

criteria.description: Instance provides privacy and security notices

controls.name: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays to prevent access and viewing of data after a period of inactivity.
controls.description: Ensure session lock with pattern-hiding displays is used.

criteria.description: Instance uses session lock with pattern-hiding displays

controls.name: Terminate (automatically) a user session after a defined condition.
controls.description: Ensure user sessions are terminated automatically after a defined condition.

criteria.description: Instance automatically terminates user sessions after a defined condition

controls.name: Monitor and control remote access sessions.
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are monitored and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance monitors and controls remote access sessions

controls.name: Employ cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions.
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are encrypted.

criteria.description: Instance uses encryption for remote access sessions

controls.name: Route remote access via managed access control points.
controls.description: Ensure remote access is routed via managed access control points.

criteria.description: Instance routes remote access via managed access control points

controls.name: Authorize remote execution of privileged commands and remote access to security-relevant information.
controls.description: Ensure remote execution of privileged commands and access to security-relevant information are authorized.

criteria.description: Instance authorizes remote execution of privileged commands

controls.name: Authorize wireless access prior to allowing such connections.
controls.description: Ensure wireless access is authorized before connections are allowed.

criteria.description: Instance authorizes wireless access before connections

controls.name: Protect wireless access using authentication and encryption.
controls.description: Ensure wireless access is protected using authentication and encryption.

criteria.description: Instance uses authentication and encryption for wireless access

controls.name: Control connection of mobile devices.
controls.description: Ensure connection of mobile devices is controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connection of mobile devices

controls.name: Encrypt CUI on mobile devices and mobile computing platforms.
controls.description: Ensure CUI on mobile devices and platforms is encrypted.

criteria.description: Instance encrypts CUI on mobile devices

controls.name: Verify and control/limit connections to and use of external systems.
controls.description: Ensure connections to external systems are verified and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connections to external systems

controls.name: Limit use of organizational portable storage devices on external systems.
controls.description: Ensure use of organizational portable storage devices on external systems is limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits use of portable storage devices on external systems

controls.name: Control CUI posted or processed on publicly accessible systems.
controls.description: Ensure CUI on publicly accessible systems is controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls CUI on publicly accessible systems

controls.name: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational information systems (including hardware, software, firmware, and documentation) throughout the respective system development life cycles.
controls.description: Ensure baseline configurations and inventories are maintained.

criteria.description: Instance maintains baseline configurations and inventories

controls.name: Establish and enforce security configuration settings for information technology products employed in organizational information systems.
controls.description: Ensure security configuration settings are enforced.

criteria.description: Instance enforces security configuration settings

controls.name: Track, review, approve/disapprove, and audit changes to information systems.
controls.description: Ensure changes to information systems are tracked, reviewed, and audited.

criteria.description: Instance tracks, reviews, and audits changes

controls.name: Analyze the security impact of changes prior to implementation.
controls.description: Ensure security impact of changes is analyzed prior to implementation.

criteria.description: Instance analyzes security impact of changes

controls.name: Define, document, approve, and enforce physical and logical access restrictions associated with changes to information systems.
controls.description: Ensure access restrictions associated with changes are enforced.

criteria.description: Instance enforces access restrictions for changes

controls.name: Employ the principle of least functionality by configuring the information system to provide only essential capabilities.
controls.description: Ensure information system provides only essential capabilities.

criteria.description: Instance is configured to provide only essential capabilities

controls.name: Restrict, disable, or prevent the use of nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services.
controls.description: Ensure nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services are restricted, disabled, or prevented.

criteria.description: Instance restricts, disables, or prevents nonessential programs and services

controls.name: Apply deny-by-exception (blacklist) policy to prevent the use of unauthorized software or deny-all, permit-by-exception (whitelist) policy to allow the execution of authorized software.
controls.description: Ensure deny-by-exception or permit-by-exception policies are applied.

criteria.description: Instance applies deny-by-exception or permit-by-exception policies

controls.description: Ensure user-installed software is controlled and monitored.

controls.description: Ensure logged events are reviewed and updated.

controls.name: Provide audit reduction and report generation to support on-demand analysis and reporting.
controls.description: Ensure audit reduction and report generation is provided.

controls.description: Ensure deny-by-exception or permit-by-exception policies are applied.

controls.description: Ensure user-installed software is controlled and monitored.

controls.name: Establish an operational incident-handling capability
controls.description: Establish an operational incident-handling capability for organizational systems that includes preparation, detection, analysis, containment, recovery, and user response activities.

criteria.description: Instance establishes an operational incident-handling capability

controls.name: Track, document, and report incidents
controls.description: Track, document, and report incidents to designated officials and/or authorities both internal and external to the organization.

criteria.description: Instance tracks, documents, and reports incidents

controls.name: Test incident response capability
controls.description: Test the organizational incident response capability.

criteria.description: Instance tests the incident response capability

controls.name: Perform system maintenance
controls.description: Perform maintenance on organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance performs maintenance on systems

controls.name: Provide maintenance controls
controls.description: Provide controls on the tools, techniques, mechanisms, and personnel used to conduct system maintenance.

criteria.description: Instance provides controls on maintenance tools and personnel

controls.name: Sanitize equipment for off-site maintenance
controls.description: Ensure equipment removed for off-site maintenance is sanitized of any CUI.

criteria.description: Instance ensures equipment is sanitized before off-site maintenance

controls.name: Check media for malicious code
controls.description: Check media containing diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before the media are used in organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance Checks media for malicious code before use

controls.name: Require MFA for nonlocal maintenance
controls.description: Require multifactor authentication to establish nonlocal maintenance sessions via external network connections and terminate such connections when nonlocal maintenance is complete.

criteria.description: Instance requires MFA for nonlocal maintenance sessions

controls.name: Supervise maintenance activities
controls.description: Supervise the maintenance activities of maintenance personnel without required access authorization.

criteria.description: Instance supervises unauthorized maintenance activities

controls.name: Protect system media
controls.description: Protect (i.e., physically control and securely store) system media containing CUI, both paper and digital.

criteria.description: Instance protects system media containing CUI

controls.name: Limit access to CUI on system media
controls.description: Limit access to CUI on system media to authorized users.

criteria.description: Instance limits access to CUI on system media to authorized users

controls.name: Sanitize or destroy system media
controls.description: Sanitize or destroy system media containing CUI before disposal or release for reuse.

criteria.description: Instance sanitizes or destroys system media before disposal or reuse

controls.name: Mark media with CUI markings
controls.description: Mark media with necessary CUI markings and distribution limitations.

criteria.description: Instance marks media with CUI markings and limitations

controls.name: Control media access and accountability
controls.description: Control access to media containing CUI and maintain accountability for media during transport outside of controlled areas.

criteria.description: Instance controls media access and maintains accountability during transport

controls.name: Implement cryptographic mechanisms
controls.description: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of CUI stored on digital media during transport unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards.

criteria.description: Instance implements cryptographic mechanisms for digital media transport

controls.name: Control removable media
controls.description: Control the use of removable media on system components.

criteria.description: Instance controls the use of removable media on system components

controls.name: Prohibit unauthorized portable storage devices
controls.description: Prohibit the use of portable storage devices when such devices have no identifiable owner.

criteria.description: Instance prohibits the use of unauthorized portable storage devices

controls.name: Protect backup CUI
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality of backup CUI at storage locations.

criteria.description: Instance protects the confidentiality of backup CUI at storage locations

controls.name: Screen individuals for CUI access
controls.description: Screen individuals prior to authorizing access to organizational systems containing CUI.

criteria.description: Instance screens individuals before granting access to CUI systems

controls.name: Protect systems during personnel actions
controls.description: Ensure that organizational systems containing CUI are protected during and after personnel actions such as terminations and transfers.

criteria.description: Instance protects CUI systems during personnel actions

controls.name: Limit physical access to systems
controls.description: Limit physical access to organizational systems, equipment, and the respective operating environments to authorized individuals.

criteria.description: Instance limits physical access to authorized individuals

controls.name: Protect and monitor physical facility
controls.description: Protect and monitor the physical facility and support infrastructure for organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance protects and monitors the physical facility and infrastructure

controls.name: Escort visitors and monitor activity
controls.description: Escort visitors and monitor visitor activity.

criteria.description: Instance escorts visitors and monitors their activity

controls.name: Maintain audit logs of physical access
controls.description: Maintain audit logs of physical access.

criteria.description: Instance maintains audit logs of physical access

controls.name: Control and manage physical access devices
controls.description: Control and manage physical access devices.

criteria.description: Instance controls and manages physical access devices

controls.name: Safeguard CUI at alternate work sites
controls.description: Enforce safeguarding measures for CUI at alternate work sites.

criteria.description: Instance enforces safeguarding measures for CUI at alternate work sites

controls.name: Assess risk to operations and assets
controls.description: Periodically assess the risk to organizational operations (including mission, functions, image, or reputation), organizational assets, and individuals, resulting from the operation of organizational systems and the associated processing, storage, or transmission of CUI.

criteria.description: Instance periodically assesses risk to operations and assets

controls.name: Scan for vulnerabilities
controls.description: Scan for vulnerabilities in organizational systems and applications periodically and when new vulnerabilities affecting those systems and applications are identified.

criteria.description: Instance scans for vulnerabilities periodically and when new vulnerabilities are identified

controls.name: Remediate vulnerabilities
controls.description: Remediate vulnerabilities in accordance with risk assessments.

criteria.description: Instance remediates vulnerabilities based on risk assessments

controls.name: Periodically assess security controls
controls.description: Periodically assess the security controls in organizational systems to determine if the controls are effective in their application.

criteria.description: Instance periodically assesses the effectiveness of security controls

controls.name: Develop and implement plans of action
controls.description: Develop and implement plans of action designed to correct deficiencies and reduce or eliminate vulnerabilities in organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance develops and implements plans of action to correct deficiencies

controls.name: Monitor security controls
controls.description: Monitor security controls on an ongoing basis to ensure the continued effectiveness of the controls.

criteria.description: Instance monitors security controls on an ongoing basis

controls.name: Develop and update system security plans
controls.description: Develop, document, and periodically update system security plans that describe system boundaries, system environments of operation, how security requirements are implemented, and the relationships with or connections to other systems.

criteria.description: Instance develops, documents, and updates system security plans

controls.name: Monitor, control, and protect communications
controls.description: Monitor, control, and protect communications (i.e., information transmitted or received by organizational systems) at the external boundaries and key internal boundaries of organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance monitors, controls, and protects communications at boundaries

controls.name: Employ architectural designs and principles
controls.description: Employ architectural designs, software development techniques, and systems engineering principles that promote effective information security within organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance employs architectural designs and principles for information security

controls.name: Separate user functionality from system management
controls.description: Separate user functionality from system management functionality.

criteria.description: Instance separates user functionality from system management

controls.name: Prevent unauthorized information transfer
controls.description: Prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.

criteria.description: Instance prevents unauthorized information transfer via shared resources

controls.name: Implement subnetworks for public access
controls.description: Implement subnetworks for publicly accessible system components that are physically or logically separated from internal networks.

criteria.description: Instance implements subnetworks for publicly accessible components

controls.name: Deny network communications by default
controls.description: Deny network communications traffic by default and allow network communications traffic by exception (i.e., deny all, permit by exception).

criteria.description: Instance denies network communications by default and allows by exception

controls.name: Prevent split tunneling
controls.description: Prevent remote devices from simultaneously establishing non-remote connections with organizational systems and communicating via some other connection to resources in external networks (i.e., split tunneling).

criteria.description: Instance prevents split tunneling by remote devices

controls.name: Implement cryptographic mechanisms for transmission
controls.description: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards.

criteria.description: Instance implements cryptographic mechanisms for transmission

controls.name: Terminate network connections
controls.description: Terminate network connections associated with communications sessions at the end of the sessions or after a defined period of inactivity.

criteria.description: Instance terminates network connections after sessions or inactivity

controls.name: Establish and manage cryptographic keys
controls.description: Establish and manage cryptographic keys for cryptography employed in organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance establishes and manages cryptographic keys

controls.name: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography
controls.description: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography when used to protect the confidentiality of CUI.

criteria.description: Instance employs FIPS-validated cryptography

controls.name: Prohibit remote activation of collaborative devices
controls.description: Prohibit remote activation of collaborative computing devices and provide indication of devices in use to users present at the device.

criteria.description: Instance prohibits remote activation of collaborative devices

controls.name: Control and monitor the use of mobile code
controls.description: Control and monitor the use of mobile code.

criteria.description: Instance controls and monitors the use of mobile code

controls.name: Control and monitor the use of VoIP
controls.description: Control and monitor the use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies.

criteria.description: Instance controls and monitors the use of VoIP

controls.name: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions
controls.description: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions.

criteria.description: Instance protects the authenticity of communications sessions

controls.name: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest.

criteria.description: Instance protects the confidentiality of CUI at rest

controls.name: Identify and correct system flaws
controls.description: Identify, report, and correct system flaws in a timely manner.

criteria.description: Instance identifies, reports, and corrects system flaws

controls.name: Provide protection from malicious code
controls.description: Provide protection from malicious code at designated locations within organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance provides protection from malicious code

controls.name: Monitor system security alerts
controls.description: Monitor system security alerts and advisories and take action in response.

criteria.description: Instance monitors security alerts and takes action

controls.name: Update malicious code protection mechanisms
controls.description: Update malicious code protection mechanisms when new releases are available.

criteria.description: Instance updates malicious code protection mechanisms

controls.name: Perform periodic and real-time scans
controls.description: Perform periodic scans of organizational systems and real-time scans of files from external sources as files are downloaded, opened, or executed.

criteria.description: Instance performs periodic and real-time scans

controls.name: Monitor inbound and outbound communications
controls.description: Monitor organizational systems, including inbound and outbound communications traffic, to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks.

criteria.description: Instance monitors communications traffic to detect attacks

controls.name: Identify unauthorized use of organizational systems
controls.description: Identify unauthorized use of organizational systems.

criteria.description: Instance identifies unauthorized use of systems
